trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, specifies a SOAP extension should run with an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，指定的 SOAP 擴充功能應該使用 XML Web 服務方法。

trans-unit.source: XML Web service methods created using ASP.NET can be configured to run with a SOAP extension by applying an attribute to the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ASP.NET 建立 XML Web 服務方法可以設定為以 SOAP 延伸模組執行方式是將屬性套用至 XML Web service 方法。

trans-unit.source: When a custom extension attribute is added to an XML Web service method or a method on a client proxy class, ASP.NET invokes the associated extension at the appropriate time.
trans-unit.target: 當 XML Web 服務方法或用戶端 proxy 類別上的方法會加入自訂延伸模組屬性時，ASP.NET 會在適當的時間叫用相關聯的延伸模組。

trans-unit.source: An extension attribute is a custom attribute class deriving from SoapExtensionAttribute.
trans-unit.target: 延伸模組屬性是衍生自 SoapExtensionAttribute 的自訂屬性類別。

trans-unit.source: Derived attributes must override the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtensionAttribute.ExtensionType%2A> property to return the type of extension that is associated with the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 衍生的屬性必須覆寫<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtensionAttribute.ExtensionType%2A>屬性，以傳回與屬性相關聯的延伸的型別。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtensionAttribute.ExtensionType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtensionAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtensionAttribute"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref:System.Type> of the SOAP extension.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得<xref:System.Type>SOAP 擴充功能。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes must override the ExtensionType property to return the type of the SOAP extension.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別必須覆寫 ExtensionType 屬性以傳回的 SOAP 擴充功能類型。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or set the priority of the SOAP extension.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫時衍生的類別，取得或設定 SOAP 擴充功能的優先順序。

trans-unit.source: The priority of the SOAP extension.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 擴充功能的優先順序。
